metadata.description: An un-named musical quartet plays songs in english and spanish. "Aborigen" poem recited.Â "Proyecto"Â musicalÂ quartet plays various songs in Spanish. Tupac dance group presents various latin dances. Program ends with the end of the "heritage day salute".
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros. Festival Latino Americano
